title: Stock Futures Rise as Earnings Season Kicks Off
sub_head: JPMorgan Chase and BlackRock are due to report results before the opening bell
body:
U.S. stock futures rose ahead of earnings reports from major companies and as investors considered the highest inflation in four decades.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 climbed 0.5%, pointing to the broad-market index recouping losses after it closed down 0.3% on Tuesday. Nasdaq-100 futures rose 0.6%, suggesting gains in technology stocks after the opening bell.
